npmPackage.name: @westegg/gatsby-theme-digital-garden
npmPackage.description: This theme extends [johno/digital-garden](https://github.com/johno/digital-garden) with further styling and works well with [@westegg/gatsby-theme-core](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@westegg/gatsby-theme-core).

childMarkdownRemark.html:
@westegg/gatsby-theme-digital-garden

This theme extends johno/digital-garden with further styling and works well with @westegg/gatsby-theme-core.

This Gatsby Theme lives in Westegg.
